static windowManager* windowManager::AddWindow ( const char *  windowName,
GLuint  width = 1280,
GLuint  height = 720,
GLuint  colourBits = 8,
GLuint  depthBits = 8,
GLuint  stencilBits = 8 
)
inlinestatic

use this to add a window to the manager. returns a pointer to the manager which allows for the easy creation of multiple windows

static GLXFBConfig windowManager::GetBestFrameBufferConfig ( tWindow *  givenWindow)
inlinestaticprivate
4919  {
4920  const GLint visualAttributes[] =
4921  {
4922  GLX_X_RENDERABLE, GL_TRUE,
4923  GLX_DRAWABLE_TYPE, GLX_WINDOW_BIT,
4924  GLX_X_VISUAL_TYPE, GLX_TRUE_COLOR,
4925  GLX_RED_SIZE, givenWindow->colourBits,
4926  GLX_GREEN_SIZE, givenWindow->colourBits,
4927  GLX_BLUE_SIZE, givenWindow->colourBits,
4928  GLX_ALPHA_SIZE, givenWindow->colourBits,
4929  GLX_DEPTH_SIZE, givenWindow->depthBits,
4930  GLX_STENCIL_SIZE, givenWindow->stencilBits,
4931  GLX_DOUBLEBUFFER, GL_TRUE,
4932  None
4933  };
4934 
4935  GLint frameBufferCount;
4936  GLuint bestBufferConfig, bestNumSamples = 0;
4937  GLXFBConfig* configs = glXChooseFBConfig( GetDisplay(), 0, visualAttributes, &frameBufferCount );
4938 
4939  for ( GLuint currentConfig = 0; currentConfig < frameBufferCount; currentConfig++ )
4940  {
4941  XVisualInfo* visualInfo = glXGetVisualFromFBConfig( GetDisplay(), configs[currentConfig] );
4942 
4943  if ( visualInfo )
4944  {
4945  //printf( "%i %i %i\n", VisInfo->depth, VisInfo->bits_per_rgb, VisInfo->colormap_size );
4946  GLint samples, sampleBuffer;
4947  glXGetFBConfigAttrib( GetDisplay(), configs[currentConfig], GLX_SAMPLE_BUFFERS, &sampleBuffer );
4948  glXGetFBConfigAttrib( GetDisplay(), configs[currentConfig], GLX_SAMPLES, &samples );
4949 
4950  if ( sampleBuffer && samples > -1 )
4951  {
4952  bestBufferConfig = currentConfig;
4953  bestNumSamples = samples;
4954  }
4955  }
4956 
4957  XFree( visualInfo );
4958  }
4959 
4960  GLXFBConfig BestConfig = configs[bestBufferConfig];
4961 
4962  XFree( configs );
4963 
4964  return BestConfig;
4965  }

4874  XMapWindow( GetDisplay(), window->windowHandle );
4875  break;
4876  }
4877 
4878  case WINDOWSTYLE_BARE:
4879  {
4880  window->decorators = ( 1L << 2 );
4881  window->currentWindowStyle = ( 1L << 2 );
4882  long Hints[5] = { LINUX_FUNCTION | LINUX_DECORATOR, window->currentWindowStyle, window->decorators, 0, 0 };
4883 
4884  XChangeProperty( GetDisplay(), window->windowHandle, window->AtomHints, XA_ATOM, 32, PropModeReplace,
4885  ( unsigned char* )Hints, 5 );
4886 
4887  XMapWindow( GetDisplay(), window->windowHandle );
4888  break;
4889  }
4890 
4891  case WINDOWSTYLE_POPUP:
4892  {
4893  window->decorators = 0;
4894  window->currentWindowStyle = ( 1L << 2 );
4895  long Hints[5] = { LINUX_FUNCTION | LINUX_DECORATOR, window->currentWindowStyle, window->decorators, 0, 0 };
4896 
4897  XChangeProperty( GetDisplay(), window->windowHandle, window->AtomHints, XA_ATOM, 32, PropModeReplace,
4898  ( unsigned char* )Hints, 5 );
4899 
4900  XMapWindow( GetDisplay(), window->windowHandle );
4901  break;
4902  }
4903 
4904  default:
4905  {
4906  PrintErrorMessage( TINYWINDOW_ERROR_INVALID_WINDOWSTYLE );
4907  break;
4908  }
4909  }
4910  }
